QuestData.Title: The Warden's Pawn
QuestData.Description: One of the few items of worth that we managed to loot from these ruins is this small jade statue.$b$bWe believe it to be a key of some sort, but we're unable to determine what it opens. As such, it is useless to me.$b$bPerhaps you'll have some better luck with it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a use for the Warden's Pawn within the Tomb of the Watchers in the Badlands.
QuestData.RewardText: <The statue clicks into place on the large stone slab.>
